results.content: The course is taught in a quick manner. Course quality and the example application could have been better. Not what I expected.

results.content: great course. instructor explains hooks nicely
I learned a lot about React hooks from this course. Great course!
results.content_html: I learned a lot about React hooks from this course. Great course!

results.content:
I'm not currently finished this whole course.
But anyway the lessons so far are great, very straight forward. But in some cases, it would be nice if he add the reason using "this method" over "others method". 
The resources he provided in every lesson are very useful.
And of course english isn't Oleksandr native language (as I'm not either), but I think it could be better to have clearer pronounce.
Overall, i would love to recommended this course to former programmer (beginner or intermediate) out there who want to learn React, especially with Hooks topics.

results.content: Excellent course. Not only does it touch on  React hooks , state management but most importantly it teaches a very scalable way of structuring your project and also teaches you how to use various hooks in the right way to deal with asynchronous api requests. I will definitely recommend this course if you are looking to learn how to code a real project and get knowledge that you can apply at work or your own projects.

results.content:
I must say that this is actually the best tutorial I've ever taken so far. It is very engaging, Oleksandr tries to explain everything he thinks is important. Sometimes it is more brief than I need, but there is google or stackoverflow or you can ask him. It's not 45 hours of information, its 8 hours and thats what it needs to be. 

I think the Context part could use one more video with little bit of more explanation, but thats maybe only my problem, because I've seen it for the first time.

Anyway 100% recommended!

Just finished the course and I can recommend it to anyone. Thanks, it was great experience.

results.content: Excellent course on React Hooks. Explanations were very to-the-point and hands on were all very practical. I would highly recommend this course.
results.content_html: Excellent course on React Hooks. Explanations were very to-the-point and hands on were all very practical. I would highly recommend this course.

results.content: I'm just two videos in and I can tell how knowledgeable and careful the instructor is. Structuring your app to avoid headaches later on is just as important as learning the new hot stuff Hooks are, and the instructor spends a good amount of time and explains things well. React is a vast ecosystem (maybe I should say a jungle), but this course will take care of one of its main areas for you: Hooks.
